transcend.3:
ATK DEF HP +10%
Burst Level 2 Unlocked
transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+40% caster's Priority when an ally resists an effect
(Effects applied at the start of battle excluded, only once per turn)
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
Burst Level 3 Unlocked
+25 Action Points at battle start
+10 Ally Speed
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
When using Code: Reverse, grants Ether Boost to Dark heroes except Healers for 1 turn
At the start of battle, grants increased Resilience to all allies for 1 turn (Irremovable)
transcend.3_jp:
ATK DEF HP +10%
バーストスキル2段階解禁
transcend.4_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +16%
味方が効果抵抗時、自分の行動ゲージ+40%
(戦闘開始時に付与される効果除外、1ターンに一度のみ発動)
チェーンパッシブのWGダメージ+1

ATK DEF HP +16%
아군 효과 저항 시 자신 행동 게이지 +40%
(전투 입장 시 생성 효과 제외, 1턴당 1회)
체인 패시브의 WG 감소량 +1
transcend.5_1_jp:
ATK DEF HP +22%

味方のスピード+10

버스트 3단계 해금

아군 속도 +10
transcend.6_jp:
ATK DEF HP +30%
【コード:リバース】使用時、回復型以外の
闇属性に【エーテルブースト】+1ターン追加

ATK DEF HP +30%
코드 : 리버스 사용 시 회복형 제외 암속성에게 에테르 부스트 +1턴 추가
전투 입장 시 아군 전체 효과 저항 +1턴 (해제 불가)

SKT_FIRST.name: Code: Purifier
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Increases Priority of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, and recovers Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of Delta's Max Health.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases Action Points of ally healing target by 70

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Grants increased Resilience to ally healing target for 2 turns
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 回復を受けた味方の効果抵抗+2ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Resets cooldown of ally healing target
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 回復を受けた味方のスキルターン初期化

description: Attacks an enemy. Increases Priority of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_1_1]</color>, and recovers Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_1_2]</color> of Delta's Max Health.
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: コード:ピューリファイヤー
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가시키고, 체력을 델타의 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>만큼 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。残りHPが最も低い味方単体の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせ、HPを自分の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復させる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Code: Icarus
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Removes 2 debuffs from the ally target, and recovers the target's Health by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> of Delta's Max Health. Then, increases Priority of the ally target by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color>.
description: Removes 2 debuffs from the ally target, and recovers the target's Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_2_2]</color> of Delta's Max Health. Then, increases Priority of the ally target by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_2_3]</color>.

5_jp: 全ての弱体効果を解除

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 아군 대상의 약화 효과를 2개 해제시키고, 대상의 체력을 델타의 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 만큼 회복시킵니다. 이후 아군 대상의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 味方対象の弱体効果を2個解除し、対象のHPを自分の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>回復させる。その後、味方対象の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>UPさせる。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Code: Reverse
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Recovers Health of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of Delta's Max Health, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Revival</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Then, grants <color=#28d9ed>Ether Boost</color> to the ally with the highest Attack for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. <color=#28d9ed>Ether Boost</COLOR> cannot be granted to Healers.
description: Recovers Health of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_3_1]</color> of Delta's Max Health, and grants <color=#28d9ed>Revival</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000100_3_2] turn(s)</color>. Then, grants <color=#28d9ed>Ether Boost</color> to the ally with the highest Attack for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000100_3_3] turn(s)</color>. <color=#28d9ed>Ether Boost</COLOR> cannot be granted to Healers.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 체력을 델타 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 만큼 회복하고, <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>소생</color>을 부여합니다. 이후 공격력이 가장 높은 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>에테르 부스트</color>를 부여합니다. <color=#28d9ed>에테르 부스트</color>는 회복형에게는 부여되지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体のHPをデルタの最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>回復させ、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>蘇生</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。その後、攻撃力が最も高い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>【エーテルブースト】</color>を付与する。<color=#28d9ed>【エーテルブースト】</color>は回復型には付与できない。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>5</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> of Delta's Max Health.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, additionally reduces Weakness Gauge by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000100_backup_1_1]</color> of Delta's Max Health.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>5</color>의 WG를 추가로 감소시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 델타 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>5</color>のWGを追加でDOWNさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPを自分の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>13%</color>回復させる。

Fullname_jp: デミウルゴス デルタ
